Question: This person continued her theatre work, next appearing in David Mamet's Boston Marriage and Speed-the-Plow.
Hints: This person made some television movies in her early career including Torch Song, Cool and the Crazy and Scattered Dreams.
In May 2011, this person gave birth to a boy, whom they named Bear Blu Jarecki.
In 2001, this person provided the voice of Sharon Spitz, the lead character in the Canadian animated television Braceface.
